articles.title: Celebrations in Culcairn as Andrew Hoy becomes Australia's oldest summer Olympics medallist - ABC News
articles.description: Dorothy Hoy — who watched last night's historic performance from her home in regional NSW  — says that, after eight Olympics, she still gets excited watching her son compete at the highest level.
articles.content:
On the outskirts of Culcairn  in the New South Wales Riverina region  stands a sign welcoming visitors to the town.

articles.title: Qld Health investigates potential COVID-19 case in Cairns - Brisbane Times
articles.description: An alert has been issued for contact tracing locations in far north Queensland after health authorities confirmed they were investigating a new case of COVID-19 detected in Cairns.
articles.content:
Traces of COVID-19 were detected on July 27 and July 28 at the Marlin Coast sewage catchment in Cairns northern beaches.
